title: Tautulli v3 is here!
body: Tautulli v3 is starting a staged rollout to the Google Play beta channel. Please note this rollout will take some time as I want to ensure there are as few issues as possible. If you are interested in getting the update early please tap here to join.

title: Welcome to Tautulli Remote!
body: Important announcements will be shared though this page. Make sure to check the Help & Support section under Settings for links to support methods and device logs.
